name: desktop-vision-vr-dev-server-example-apps
description: A collection of example apps built with Desktop Vision VR Dev Server

scripts.build:basic: mkdir dist/basic && cd basic && npm i && npm run build && cp -r public/* ../dist/basic
scripts.build:robot: mkdir dist/gesture-robot && cd gesture-robot && npm i && npm run build && cp -r public/* ../dist/gesture-robot
scripts.build:examples: npm run build:robot && npm run build:basic
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && hbs --data ./pages.json ./index.hbs --output ./dist/ && npm run build:examples

author: Vali Ventures LLC
